attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
100 year old allotments are to be concreted over for a temporary walkway connected with the 2012 Olympics.
The land was given in perpetuity to the people, not to the London Council, nor the Government so why does either think they have the right to now take this land away?
Another American concept creeping into our way of life?
Weren't the Indians promised land in perpetuity, and didn't they lose it for the "better cause"?
Leave our land alone and honour the wishes of the people for once.
